Unnayati - what's it all about?
Unnayati offers Life Science consulting services in drug discovery, pipeline strategy, project out-sourcing, preclinical project management and orphan applications.

Unnayati (pronounced Oona-yarti) means "to discover by inference". That's just a case of taking time to sit and think about things... When did you last have time for that?

Whether you are looking for fresh product ideas, help with portfolio decisions or need interim project management, Unnayati can deliver the solution.

Let Unnayati do the work and give yourself some space to think...
